title: The chances a comedy, as it was acted at the Theater Royal / corrected and altered by a person of honour.
author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: Printed for A.B. and S.M. and sold by Langley Curtis ...,
notes: Fletcher's "unaided composition" with acts IV and V completely rewritten by George Buckingham. The plot is from "La Se√±ora Cornelia," one of Cervantes' Novelas exemplares. Cf. DNB.
